Create expression for binning data

Source: R/targeter.r
create_binning_expression.Rd

Helper function to create the expression for binning numeric variables

Usage

create_binning_expression(target, num_vars, other_vars, binning_function)

Arguments

target

character - name of the target variable

num_vars

character vector - names of numeric variables

other_vars

character vector - names of other variables

binning_function

function - the binning function to use

Value

character string with the expression to evaluate

On this page
